titleInfo.title: Music Masters series featuring Garth Fundis

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and brown on white) Hatch poster announcing Music Masters, an interview with Garth Fundis who produced for New Grass Revival, Sugarland, Keith Whitley, Don Williams, and Trisha Yearwood. Event supports the exhibit: Trisha Yearwood: The Song Remembers when at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Poster features music related woodcuts.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
